alert.note: Alert for Castro; Hale; Lubbock; Lynn; Parmer; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 1:39PM CST until November 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Rain mixed with snow. Snow accumulations up to an inch. * WHERE...Hale, Lubbock, Lynn, Castro, Parmer, and Swisher Counties. * WHEN...Until Noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Castro; Hale; Lubbock; Lynn; Parmer; Swisher
